articles.title: U.S. journalist Renaud killed in Ukraine by Russian forces - P.M. News
articles.description: Russian forces have killed an American journalist and documentary filmmaker Brent Renaud in Irpin, Ukraine.
articles.content:
Russian forces have killed an American journalist and documentary filmmaker Brent Renaud in Irpin, Ukraine, the chief of police of Kyiv said.
